text: She had a tough start to the year, after being forced to apologise for using a racial slur in her 2014 cover of a song. And it looks as though things have continued down a rocky path, after reports claim Dua Lipa has split with musician Paul Klein. The New Rules hitmaker, 22, has reportedly parted ways with the 29 - year - old LANY frontman after five months, but is said to already be'messaging'her model ex - boyfriend of two years Isaac Carew.
